description.fr: Lorsqu'un {%FAMILY_RAT_NAME} meurt\_:\v Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} aux adversaires adjacents\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> à lui.
description.en: When a {%FAMILY_RAT_NAME} dies:\vDoes {magicalDamage:dmg} to adjacent\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> opponents.
description.es: Cuando una {%FAMILY_RAT_NAME} muere:\v Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} a los adversarios adyacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> a ella.
description.de: Wenn eine {%FAMILY_RAT_NAME} stirbt:\v Verursacht {magicalDamage:dmg} bei angrenzenden Gegnern\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
description.pt: Quando um {%FAMILY_RAT_NAME} morre:\v Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} aos adversários adjacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> a ele.
